ResultType.description: Results set from a survey publisher based on inputs from participants.

dimensionType.description: Primary data cut. e.g All Data, Industry, Geography, Specialty, Subset, Employer Size, etc.

dimensionSubType.description: Secondary data cut. e.g Incumbent Filter.

dimensionName.description: Name of industry, Geography, Specialty, Subset, Employer Size, etc.

statisticName.description: Statistics done on each set of data. e.g. 25th percentile

statisticAmount.description: The resulting amount of the statistic for the reward of this job

statisticPercent.description: The resulting percent of the statistic for the reward of this job

numberOfOrganizations.description: The number of organizations that have reported data for this job

numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees that have reported data for this job

source.description: The origins of the survey result

publicationCompany.description: Which company has published this survey result

publicationName.description: What is the name of the survey being published for this survey result

publicationDate.description: What is the date this survey was published for this survey result

publicationNotes.description: Any additional notes for this survey publication

results.description: Code classifying the survey job code levels e.g., 1, 2, 3, 4
